Class DSTokenizer

java.lang.Object

              org.dspace.search.DSTokenizer

public final class DSTokenizer
extends org.apache.lucene.analysis.CharTokenizer

Customized Lucene Tokenizer, since the standard one rejects numbers from indexing/querying.
